Function reference

Derivations

Derivations add one or more variables or parameters to the input dataset and return the extended dataset.

derive_param_bor()
Adds a Parameter for Best Overall Response (without confirmation)
derive_param_clinbenefit()
Adds a Parameter for Clinical Benefit
derive_param_confirmed_bor()
Adds a Parameter for Confirmed Best Overall Response
derive_param_confirmed_resp()
Adds a Parameter for Confirmed Response
derive_param_lasta()
Adds a Parameter for the Last Disease Assessment
derive_param_response()
Adds a Parameter Indicating If a Subject Had a Response before Progressive Disease

CDISC Hierarchy

ADRS

ADRS specific functions

derive_param_bor()
Adds a Parameter for Best Overall Response (without confirmation)
derive_param_clinbenefit()
Adds a Parameter for Clinical Benefit
derive_param_confirmed_bor()
Adds a Parameter for Confirmed Best Overall Response
derive_param_confirmed_resp()
Adds a Parameter for Confirmed Response
derive_param_lasta()
Adds a Parameter for the Last Disease Assessment
derive_param_response()
Adds a Parameter Indicating If a Subject Had a Response before Progressive Disease
filter_pd()
Filter up to First PD (Progressive Disease) Date

Other Keywords

Pre-Defined Time-to-Event Sources

tte_source objects defined by {admiralonco} that can be used as input for admiral::derive_param_tte()

death_event lastalive_censor pd_event lasta_censor rand_censor trts_censor
Pre-Defined Time-to-Event Source Objects

ADaM Datasets

admiral_adrs
Response Analysis Dataset

User Utilities

aval_resp()
Map Character Response Values to Numeric Values
count_vals()
Count Number of Observations Where a Variable Equals a Value
filter_confirmation()
Filter Confirmed Assessments
filter_pd()
Filter up to First PD (Progressive Disease) Date
max_cond()
Maximum Value on a Subset
min_cond()
Minimum Value on a Subset
